welcome.description: Manage inventory, orders, warehouses, and payments — all in one place.
welcome.subDescription: Fast, cost-effective, and easy to use.

superEasy.title: Super Easy
superEasy.description: Just copy a few lines of code, hand instructions to your developer or AI assistant, or start quickly with one of our pre-built shop templates.

selfService.title: Self Service
selfService.description: Use your own Stripe account to accept payments, add products effortlessly, and integrate or link Checkoutbay directly from your website.

atCost.title: At Cost
atCost.description: No investors to please — just reliable essentials, with affordable pricing: ~1% per sale or €790/year for self-hosted.

inventory.title: Inventory & Warehouses
inventory.description: Manage multiple warehouses and track stock in real time to keep your store running smoothly and customers satisfied.

developerFriendly.title: Developer-Friendly
developerFriendly.description: Access a robust API library and example shops to customize and extend your store exactly how you want.

privacy.title: Privacy Focused
privacy.description: We collect minimal data, prioritizing your customers' privacy while providing fast and secure checkout experiences.

cta.title: Ready to get started selling online?
cta.description: No complex onboarding — just seamless form data handling.
cta.loginDescription: Already part of the Checkoutbay family? Log in to manage your forms.

account.addWarehouseAddress: Add an address for your warehouse
account.addShippingRates: Add shipping rates from your warehouse
account.formshivePromo: Need web forms for contact, support or RMA? Checkout

navigation.currencyWarning: It's not possible to change the currency later.
navigation.createFirstShop: Create your first shop to get started

products.title: Title
products.coverUrlDescription: URL to the product cover image. Images will be displayed in a square (1:1) format on the product catalog and scaled to fit without cropping or stretching.
products.allowNegativeStockDescription: Allow purchases when stock is below 0
products.isLiveDescription: Show the product on the website
products.privateDataNote: Private data is only visible to the store owner
products.publicDataNote: Public data is visible to everyone
products.physicalPropertiesDescription: This aids the shipping fee calculation.

warehouses.title: Title
warehouses.shippingRateTemplatesDescription: Associate shipping rate templates with this warehouse

paymentMethods.tip: Tip: Set the secret key and webhook secret as it cannot be edited after saving.
paymentMethods.title: Title
paymentMethods.currencySupport: Refer to Stripe documentation which currencies are supported in your country
paymentMethods.publicKeyDescription: Public key from the payment provider (pk_...)
paymentMethods.secretKeyNote: Secret key is not editable. If you want to change it, create a new payment method
paymentMethods.secretKeyDescription: Secret key from the payment provider (sk_...)
paymentMethods.productIdDescription: Product ID which will be used for the payment
paymentMethods.invoiceDescription: Invoice payments allow customers to pay via bank transfer or other manual payment methods. Orders will be marked as pending payment until you manually confirm payment receipt.
paymentMethods.webhookUrlDescription: URL where the payment provider will send the payment status
paymentMethods.webhookSecretNote: Webhook secret is not editable. If you want to change it, create a new payment method

stockMovements.reasonDescription: Use the reason to categorize the stock movement.
stockMovements.quantityDescription: Use a negative quantity for sales, returns, and adjustments and a positive quantity for purchases and transfers.
stockMovements.warehouseTransferNote: If you are transferring between two of your warehouses, you have to create two stock movements, one for each warehouse.
stockMovements.referenceDescription: Use the reference to link the stock movement to an external system.

shippingRates.title: Title
shippingRates.descriptionPlaceholder: Standard shipping rate for international orders
shippingRates.calculationMethodDescription: Choose how the shipping rate should be calculated
shippingRates.freeShippingNote: Set to 0 to disable free shipping

entities.selectShopMessage: You need to select a shop from the sidebar to view this page.
entities.newProductDescription: Products are the things you sell
entities.newWarehouseDescription: Use warehouses to manage your stock in different locations
entities.newAddressDescription: Use addresses to specify a location
entities.newStockMovementDescription: Use stock movements to track stock changes
entities.newPaymentMethodDescription: Use payment methods to accept payments
entities.newOrderDescription: Use orders to manage your sales
entities.newShippingRateTemplateDescription: Use shipping rate templates to manage your shipping rates
entities.createProductDescription: Add a new product to your store.
entities.createAddressDescription: Add a new address to your account.
entities.createStockMovementDescription: Add a new stock movement to your account.
entities.createPaymentMethodDescription: Add a new payment method to your account.
entities.createShippingRateTemplateDescription: Add a new shipping rate template to your account.

billing.usageDescription: We charge by usage, not month; Make 10 sales per year? No problem.
